sentences.en: ...over 40 percent of adults use television as their major source of information about the arts.
sentences.cn: …超过40%的成年人利用电视作为他们了解艺术信息的主要来源。

sentences.en: Business office supplies stop sourcing platform to help themselves.
sentences.cn: 企业办公用品一站式自助采购平台.

sentences.en: But some believe the bulk of sourcing gains have been made.
sentences.cn: 但一些人认为,外包的大部分利益已经实现.

sentences.en: Department manager, department supervisor, project executive, sales engineer, salesman, administrator, sourcing staff.
sentences.cn: 部门经理, 部门主管, 项目主管, 销售工程师, 销售人员, 行政人员, 采购人员等.

sentences.en: Ethical Sourcing: Bring us health ! Protect the enviroment ! Help social exclusive producers!
sentences.cn: 道德采购: 健康自我、护环境、心弱势生产者!

sentences.en: Good sourcing skills and have firm relations with the factories in China.
sentences.cn: 良好的采购技巧、中国大陆有稳定的工厂资源.

sentences.en: In charge of arrangement and tracing out sourcing supplier issues.
sentences.cn: 负责安排跟踪外协加工事宜.

sentences.en: In charge of logistics service suppliers'sourcing, negotiation and managements.
sentences.cn: 负责物流运输供应商的谈判与管理.

sentences.en: Renewable sources of energy must be used.
sentences.cn: 可再生的能源必须利用。

sentences.en: Request of TJ local procurement in Sourcing Fair is prime business requirement.
sentences.cn: 在供应商会议上提出天津本地采购是主要业务需求.

sentences.en: Sensitive and proficient in new products development and sourcing.
sentences.cn: 具有良好的新品开发和采购能力.

sentences.en: Sourcing new Garment suppliers for various woven, knit and denim garment.
sentences.cn: 能开发新的针织,梭织,牛仔等服装生产厂商.

sentences.en: The union is particularly concerned at the sourcing of products abroad.
sentences.cn: 该联盟尤其关注海外的产品货源。

sentences.en: They are sourcing from abroad in order to save money.
sentences.cn: 为了省钱,他们的材料、零件从国外开源.

sentences.en: Together they travel the world, sourcing clothes for the small, privately owned company.
sentences.cn: 他们一道走遍世界各地，为那家私营小公司寻觅服装货源。

sentences.en: We are now sourcing all our pumps from our European supplier.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的水泵都是从欧洲进口的.

sentences.en: You are a sourcing manager and looking for shipping appliances to Europe.
sentences.cn: 你是采购经理并正在找合适的家电产品出口到欧洲.

words.tran_cn: 发起；向…提供消息（source的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: The source of something is the person, place, or thing which you get it from

trans.tran_cn: 发起；向…提供消息（source的ing形式）
